title: Parking Location Data Update
description: Use this form to add or update parking location information. All fields marked with * are required.

questions.title: Location Name *
questions.helpText: Enter the name of the parking location (e.g., 'Main Street Parking', 'City Hall Lot')

questions.title: Address *
questions.helpText: Full street address of the parking location

questions.title: Latitude *
questions.helpText: Latitude coordinate (decimal format, e.g., 40.7128). Use Google Maps to find coordinates.

questions.title: Longitude *
questions.helpText: Longitude coordinate (decimal format, e.g., -74.0060). Use Google Maps to find coordinates.

questions.title: Total Capacity *
questions.helpText: Total number of parking spaces available

questions.title: Available Spaces
questions.helpText: Current number of available spaces (leave blank if same as total capacity)

questions.title: Location Type *
questions.helpText: Select the type of parking location

questions.title: Restrictions
questions.helpText: Any parking restrictions, separated by commas (e.g., 'No overnight parking, Permit required after 6 PM')

questions.title: Operating Hours
questions.helpText: Hours when parking is available (e.g., '24/7', '6 AM - 10 PM')

settings.confirmationMessage: Thank you! Your parking data update has been submitted and will be processed shortly.
